text: The Eccles Establishment was an Anglican mission to India in the 19th"Colonial Ecclesiastical Establishment: being a brief view of the state of the colonies of Great Britain, and of her Asiatic empire in respect to religious instruction ... To which is added, a Sketch of an ecclesiastical establishment for British India" Buchanan, C p48: London, Cadell and Davies, 1813 and 20th centuries.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1929 p1389: LOnson, OOP, 1927 ==Notes== Category:Christian missions in India
title: Eccles Establishment
